cause.description:
Our mission is to provide educational and leadership opportunities for disadvantaged youth in the Philippines who show a passion to learn and make a difference in society by serving others.
1. 100% operated by VOLUNTEERS, so all donations go towards education of disadvantaged students.
2. With approximately half of Filipino citizens living in poverty, education of the country’s youth is a luxury.
3. Our students will make a difference. All you have to do is Believe.
4. Please visit our website for more information (believeinternational.org).
cause.mission: Building Effective Leadership, Integrity, Excellence and Values through Education
cause.name: BELIEVE International
